text:
About Celebrities

If you're obsessed with a particular celebrity, you might read every article you can find about that person. Although many fans devour entertainment magazines to see how their favorite Hollywood celebrities spent their weekends or learn about their newest projects, fans can also find stories about stars’ personal finances.

Since celebrities earn more than the average person, you might think you’re on different playing fields and can’t learn anything from the way they manage their money. You can learn a lot about money management from celebrities, including what to do and what not to do —here’s looking at you, Kanye West — with your money.

GOBankingRates features articles related to celebrities and their personal finances. Whether you're looking for some money advice from your famous counterparts or you want to know how they spend their cash, you can find those kinds of articles — and more — on GOBankingRates.
title: Entertainment Finance Celebrities

meta_data.description: Get entertainment finance celebrities news, advice and information from leading personal finance site GOBankingRates.com
